DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial investigate effect dairy product call metabolic syndrome . Metabolic syndrome cluster risk factor , high blood pressure high cholesterol , development diabetes heart disease . Participants randomly assign either eat portion Norwegian traditional cheese high protein low fat ( group 1 ) , eat slightly high normal intake regular Gouda-type cheese ( group 2 ) , limit intake cheese ( group 3 ) . Dairy product significant source bioactive peptide , small piece protein may effect health . These effect may antimicrobial , antioxidative , blood pressure lower . The traditional Norwegian cheese , Gamalost , naturally high protein ( 50 % ) low fat ( < 1 % ) , find particularly high bioactive peptide . Specifically , cheese find high ACE-inhibitory activity , mean potential low blood pressure without use pharmaceutical . A pilot study perform May 2012 . No intervention give trial , participant answer extensive questionnaire dietary habit lifestyle . This trial find people eat Gamalost slightly low blood pressure eat cheese . Since point-in-time study intervention control , investigator able say anything certain cause effect , investigator want perform large control study . In total , investigator aim recruit 300 people participate trial , i.e . 100 group . The participant randomly place one group intervention eight week . At inclusion , investigator measure blood pressure , fast blood glucose , weight , height , waist circumference , investigator draw fast blood sample measure cholesterol . The measurement repeat end eight week . At inclusion also fill extensive questionnaire diet lifestyle . A short version questionnaire also give end trial period . The overall goal study assess effect dairy product metabolic syndrome , main hypothesis ass whether high intake Gamalost reduce blood pressure group people .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult Must able eat cheese evey day Pregnant woman Taking blood pressure lower medication Not able read Norwegian
